org.opencyc.chat
Class ConsoleChat

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.opencyc.chat.ConsoleChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChatSender
public class ConsoleChat
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChatSender

Provides a console chat application using the Cyc ChatterBot.

The chat conversation is in the form of a text conversation using asynchronous receiving and sending of messages.

Author:
